name: UTG:AR
description:
...i hope you i'll be stuck in your own crisis of your life.
i hope you i'll see this over and over again, and never wake up from your dreams...

...whenever PRIMARY opens her eye, she finds herself in dream. there is no way to wake up... or is it?

UTG:AR is a dream game inspired by LSD dream emulator and yume nikki.

wander around dreamscapes, enjoy the theme.
collect objects, trigger "wake up" events.
interact with dream characters.
-repeat.

-20~30 minutes of dream exploring based off personal dream journal.
-a minimum story to accompany less-personal, game reliability
-objectives to keep you busy while wandering

Arrow Keys = movement
Z or Enter = select
X = cancel
Shift = call menu
